overview: In the second installment of the decadent Reign of Tera series, Tera Patrick gets back in action with her first ever boy-boy-girl scene. We find her back at the Asian Love Palace, Mr. Jonez's high roller Asian whorehouse, where every imaginable fantasy is fulfilled. However, sex, jealousy, drama, and even murder leave everyone in this lust filled XXX thriller wanting more...
tagline: Return To The Asian Love Palace
title: Reign of Tera 2
